data.comment: A total of 10554 spectators is reported.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Free kick Krasnodar.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Rubin Kazan's Hwang In-beom is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Krasnodar Stadium.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 15, Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 17, Mikhail Vilkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Krasnodar Stadium.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Igor Smolnikov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 21, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Igor Smolnikov returns to the field for Krasnodar after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 23, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 26, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 27, Mikhail Vilkov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
In the minute 30, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Krasnodar Stadium.
Krasnodar are coming forward and Alexey Ionov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick in a good position for Rubin Kazan!
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Krasnodar.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Krasnodar advance rapidly upfield but Mikhail Vilkov blows for offside.
Oleg Shatov (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov waits before resuming play because Yuri Dyupin for Rubin Kazan is still down.
Krasnodar have been given a penalty...
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Yuri Dyupin is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Djordje Despotovic of Rubin Kazan is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Krasnodar Stadium.
Remy Cabella nets and Krasnodar now lead 1-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Djordje Despotovic for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Mikhail Vilkov and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Krasnodar make their first substitution with Viktor Claesson replacing Evgeni Markov.
In the minute 47, In Krasnodar Rubin Kazan drive forward through Ilya Samoshnikov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 49, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Djordje Despotovic of Rubin Kazan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Krasnodar's Igor Smolnikov has run offside.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
It's now 2-0 in Krasnodar as Kristoffer Olsson scores for Krasnodar.
In the minute 55, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Krasnodar Stadium, Oliver Abildgaard for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 56, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
At Krasnodar Stadium, Igor Smolnikov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 57, Play has been interrupted briefly in Krasnodar to check on Kristoffer Olsson, who is grimacing with pain.
Leonid Slutskiy (Rubin Kazan) is making a first substitution, with Khvicha Kvaratskhelia replacing Soltmurad Bakaev.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 59, Kristoffer Olsson is back on his feet again.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Viktor Claesson of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 62, Rubin Kazan are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Rubin Kazan's Oliver Abildgaard attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Krasnodar drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ivan Ignatyev is replacing Hwang In-beom for the away team.
In the minute 69, Krasnodar needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 71, Daniil Utkin is replacing Remy Cabella for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
The home team replace Alexey Ionov with Shapi Suleymanov.
Attention is being given to Krasnodarâ€™s Viktor Claesson and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 73, Viktor Claesson for Krasnodar is back on the field again.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Marcus Berg is on a sub for Igor Smolnikov for Krasnodar.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 80, Marcus Berg for Krasnodar is whistled offside.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar attack through Tonny Vilhena. The finish is off target, however.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Viktor Claesson, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Cristian Ramirez is the substitute for Krasnodar.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Krasnodar Stadium.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Khvicha Kvaratskhelia with Aleksandr Zuev. This is the third substitution made today by Leonid Slutskiy.
In the minute 86, Oleg Shatov (Rubin Kazan) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Krasnodar.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Krasnodar's Shapi Suleymanov goes close with a header against the bar.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Sergei Petrov fires in a strike for Krasnodar.
Krasnodar drive forward but Sergei Petrov is judged offside.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan just outside Krasnodar's area.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Denis Makarov (Rubin Kazan) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Goal! Marcus Berg extends Krasnodar's lead to 3-0.
Krasnodar's Kaio Pantaleao has been booked in Krasnodar.
Carl Starfelt (Rubin Kazan) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 3-1.
